Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black (almost completely worn) below; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Many kantharoi Type B (See Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983, 169) have painted inscriptions beneath the rim; several have been found on Aegina as well as at Naukratis.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1834) (phase 2)
